actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to allow certain employees of the Government who are eligible for health insurance benefits under title XVIII of such act to receive coverage thereunder without regard to other health insurance plans.

summary.text: Permits employees of the Government who are eligible for health insurance benefits under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to receive coverage thereunder without regard to other health insurance plans.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to allow certain employees of the Government who are eligible for health insurance benefits under title XVIII of such act to receive coverage thereunder without regard to other health insurance plans.
